messages.message: In Build, when I add a first class, I get the *Edit class* panel. Subsequent class editions trigger the *Add class* panel. Can we make the first class addition also result in the *Add class* panel? Docs instructions are weird because of this inconsistency. @Serena Arjun sent me to you...
this is because when we click the class for the first time, we're actually editing the name of the default class, but i agree that in this case it should say add class

@CJ i updated these panels (https://www.figma.com/file/fiEWY0G549gJjsqWfDthjC/%5BREADY-FOR-DEV%5D-Enterprise-User-Journeys?type=design&node-id=4152-431365&mode=design&t=E8ZiwBgUeB1V0Mik-4) to have the name of the class at the top (it's what we're doing for fields)

so it says "New class" until a class name is entered and then we just match whatever the text input is
great! i liked that better anyway! i'll include it for the class panel changes ticket
